updates.description: The new API v2.0 allows developers to create, read, update, and delete tasks in Zocks programmatically. This includes the ability to manage task assignments, statuses, and due dates.
updates.automation_value: This update can save time by automating task management in Zocks. Tasks can be automatically created or updated based on triggers from other systems.
updates.business_impact: This update can significantly reduce manual work and improve process efficiency by automating task management.

updates.description: The Workflow Automation feature allows users to automate repetitive tasks in Zocks. Users can create custom workflows that automatically perform actions based on specific triggers.
updates.automation_value: This feature can reduce manual work by automating repetitive tasks. A workflow could be set up to automatically assign tasks to team members based on their workload or expertise.
updates.business_impact: This feature can streamline business processes and improve team efficiency by automating repetitive tasks.

updates.description: Zocks now integrates with Zapier, allowing users to connect Zocks with over 2,000 other apps. Users can create automated workflows that trigger actions in other apps based on events in Zocks.
updates.automation_value: This integration can save time by automating workflows across multiple apps. A new task in Zocks could automatically trigger a reminder in a user's calendar app.
updates.business_impact: This integration can improve business efficiency by automating workflows across multiple apps, reducing manual work and potential errors.

updates.description: The Time Tracker feature allows users to track the time they spend on tasks in Zocks. The tracked time can be automatically added to task descriptions and reports.
updates.automation_value: This feature can save time by automating the process of tracking and reporting time spent on tasks. This could be particularly useful for teams that bill clients based on time spent.
updates.business_impact: This feature can improve business efficiency and accuracy in client billing by automating time tracking and reporting.

updates.description: The API v2.1 update adds the ability to manage Zocks projects programmatically. Developers can now create, read, update, and delete projects, as well as manage project members and statuses.
updates.automation_value: This update can save time by automating project management in Zocks. Projects could be automatically created or updated based on triggers from other systems.
updates.business_impact: This update can significantly improve project management efficiency by automating project creation, updates, and management.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: Zocks API v2.0
   Release Date: November 15, 2023
   Description: The new API v2.0 allows developers to create, read, update, and delete tasks in Zocks programmatically. This includes the ability to manage task assignments, statuses, and due dates.
   Automation Value: This update can save time by automating task management in Zocks. For example, tasks can be automatically created or updated based on triggers from other systems.

2. Update Name: Zocks Workflow Automation
   Release Date: March 12, 2024
   Description: The Workflow Automation feature allows users to automate repetitive tasks in Zocks. Users can create custom workflows that automatically perform actions based on specific triggers.
   Automation Value: This feature can reduce manual work by automating repetitive tasks. For example, a workflow could be set up to automatically assign tasks to team members based on their workload or expertise.

3. Update Name: Zocks Integration with Zapier
   Release Date: July 20, 2024
   Description: Zocks now integrates with Zapier, allowing users to connect Zocks with over 2,000 other apps. Users can create automated workflows that trigger actions in other apps based on events in Zocks.
   Automation Value: This integration can save time by automating workflows across multiple apps. For example, a new task in Zocks could automatically trigger a reminder in a user's calendar app.

4. Update Name: Zocks Time Tracker
   Release Date: January 5, 2025
   Description: The Time Tracker feature allows users to track the time they spend on tasks in Zocks. The tracked time can be automatically added to task descriptions and reports.
   Automation Value: This feature can save time by automating the process of tracking and reporting time spent on tasks. This could be particularly useful for teams that bill clients based on time spent.

5. Update Name: Zocks API v2.1
   Release Date: June 30, 2025
   Description: The API v2.1 update adds the ability to manage Zocks projects programmatically. Developers can now create, read, update, and delete projects, as well as manage project members and statuses.
   Automation Value: This update can save time by automating project management in Zocks. For example, projects could be automatically created or updated based on triggers from other systems.
